title_en: UN Member States’ level of support for treaty
Support for treaty’s global, binding measures to minimise total pollution through reduction and elimination of the production of problematic plastics
Support for treaty’s global, binding measures to minimise total pollution through increased and non-toxic circulation of plastic products
Support for treaty’s global, binding measures to minimise total pollution through improved waste management, remediation activities, and other measures
Support for treaty’s mechanism to provide necessary support to countries for the implementation of the treaty’s obligations
